column4: hey guys, does anybody of you know how to combine two single gigabit-ethernet connections to a "trunk", so that I have a redundand 2-gigabit connection that is reachable by a single ip-address ?
yess, you need a switch which supports port-trunking ...
if you poke around in /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/ there's an option for it iirc
